name: The Hunger Games
author: by Suzanne Collins
description: Could you survive on your own, in the wild, with everyone out to make sure you don't live to see the morning?

name: lord of the rings
author: by J.R.R. Tolkien
description: One Ring to rule them all, One Ring to find them, One Ring to bring them all and in the darkness bind them

name: Beloved
author: by Toni Morrison
description: Staring unflinchingly into the abyss of slavery, this spellbinding novel transforms history into a story as powerful as Exodus and as intimate as a lullaby.
